text: Va kasone, ki ʙa on ci Alloh taolo az fazli xes ʙa onon dodaast, ʙuxl mevarzand, gumon nakunand, ki on [ʙuxl] ʙarojason xajr ast; ʙalki ʙarojason sar ast. Dar ruzi qijomat on ci ʙa on ʙuxl mevarzidand, tavqi gardanason xohad sud [va ʙo on azoʙ mesavand]; va merosi osmonhovu zamin az oni Alloh taolo ast va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci mekuned, ogoh ast
